colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,(CES BLA MA MCHOD PA'I CHO GA DNGOS GRUB 'DOD 'JO'I SNYING PO BSDUS @012B PA YID BZHIN GYI NOR BU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI MANG THOS RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA AER TI NI RAB 'BYAMS PA DANG, BIN THU DGE SLONG GNYIS KYIS RKYANG RING PO NAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI BKA' 'BANGS THA CHUNG GZHUNG LUGS RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA SKU SKYE BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING GZHAN RGYAL DBANG THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA CHEN PO'I BKA' LUNG GIS DZA YA PAndI TA KHU THUG THU ZHES 'BOD PAS, RGYAL DBANG THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA CHEN PO'I MDZAD PA'I BLA MA MCHOD PA BSDUS PA SNYING PO BSDUS SHING, LEGS CHA 'GA' ZHIG THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO DANG, PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO GNYIS KYIS MDZAD PA'I BLA MA MCHOD PA NAS KHA BSKANG TE, 'PHAGS @013A *, ,YUL DU  DHARMA TI ZHES 'BOD CING, RGYA NAG PO'I YUL DU ZIN YE'U ZHES GRAGS PA, BLO NGAN ZHES PA LCAGS MO BYA LO'I HOR ZLA BCU GNYIS PA'I TSES CUR BDUN GZA' NYI MA DANG, SKAR MA MCHU 'PHRAD PA'I 'PHEL SBYOR GYI NYIN SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG BDAG DANG SEMS CAN THAMS CAD TSE RABS KUN TU BSHES GNYEN MCHOG GIS RJES SU 'DZIN PAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS, ,'PHEL, ,)
